content:
Hello everyone!

Excuse my ignorance, but I'm interesting in learning about what kind (if any) carbon sequestration work is being done here at NCAR and who is doing it. It can be brief (i.e., ideal for Zulip); I'm just curious.

Thanks in advance!

-- Kevin
Hi @Kevin Paul , you might want to take a look at CCIS (https://www.ccis.ucar.edu) and their forum (https://www.ccis.ucar.edu/forum/). I think @Peter Lawrence would be your first stop.
Thanks, @Brian Medeiros! I really appreciate that.
I'm also interested in carbon sequestration work and will take a look at this :)
@Kevin Paul, we're starting to work on ocean carbon dioxide removal.
